alert.note: Alert for Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 10:20PM CDT until May 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Holt County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1019 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Falls City, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Mound City, Oregon, Maitland, Forest City, Craig, White Cloud, Big Lake, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning, Iowa Point and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 67 and 98. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
